remarks: Show the commutative law for an operation ` O ` on a toy structure class ` C ` of commuatitive operations on ` CC ` .  This illustrates how a structure class can be partially specialized.  In practice, we would ordinarily define a new constant such as "CAbel" in place of ` C ` . (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
toycom.1 $e |- C = { g e. Abel | ( Base ` g ) = CC } $.
toycom.2 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` K ) $.
toycom $p |- ( ( K e. C /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A .+ B ) = ( B .+ A ) ) $.
$d K g $.
